content: Singaporean women's esports organisationThe topic of this article **may not meet Wikipedia's general notability guideline**. If notability cannot be shown, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted. *Find sources:* "Asterisk" esports – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Asterisk** (stylised as **Asterisk***; formerly **Team Asterisk** and **PMS Asterisk**) is a Singaporean women's [esports](/wiki/Esports) organisation. It was founded by Tammy Tang in 2005 as an all-women *[Dota](/wiki/Defense_of_the_Ancients)* team. - Asterisk on [Facebook](/wiki/Facebook_(identifier)) This article related to an [esports](/wiki/Esports) organization is a stub. title: Asterisk (esports)
